text: Ohun tí (Allāhu) ṣe ní èèwọ̀ fun yín ni ẹran òkúǹbete, ẹ̀jẹ̀, ẹran ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ àti èyí tí wọ́n pa pẹ̀lú orúkọ t’ó yàtọ́ sí “Allāhu”. Nítorí náà, ẹnikẹ́ni tí wọ́n bá fi ìnira ebi kan, yàtọ̀ sí ẹni t’ó ń wá èèwọ̀ kiri àti olùtayọ-ẹnu-àlà, dájúdájú Allāhu ni Aláforíjìn, Àṣàkẹ́-ọ̀run
